name: SMX (Security Matters) PLC
description: SMX (Security Matters) PLC is a pioneering technology company that focuses on enhancing supply chain transparency through its innovative track-and-trace technology. Founded in 2018, SMX aims to address the growing demand for sustainability and ethical sourcing in various industries, including fashion, food, and pharmaceuticals. The company develops proprietary digital solutions that enable businesses to monitor and verify the provenance of their products throughout the supply chain, ensuring compliance with environmental and social governance (ESG) standards. By using advanced blockchain technology, the SMX platform provides immutable records that help businesses build trust with consumers and stakeholders alike. SMX’s commitment to sustainability is evident in its efforts to combat counterfeiting and reduce waste, fostering a more responsible and transparent marketplace. The company's technology not only empowers brands to demonstrate their sustainability claims but also enhances consumer confidence in the products they purchase. With a growing global emphasis on ethical consumption, SMX is positioned to play a significant role in transforming supply chain practices across multiple sectors, ultimately driving a shift towards more sustainable business models.
